posts.post_content:
Just back from PSA. 

A really nice card that doesn't fit in my collection of 2's and 3's....haha.

Asking $SOLD shipped, but definitely negotiable.  Card is cross listed on eBay too.

As for trades, will definitely listen.  Love me some EPDG's, especially ones I don't have.
